definition: journey/trip/expedition/to go on long campaign/to attack

sentences.english: There was a time, long ago, when Ewoks would war among each other.
sentences.chinese: 伊沃克人互相征戰的時代逝去已久。

sentences.english: Vosa was with Dooku on Galidraan when the Jedi all but vanquished the Mandalorian ranks.
sentences.chinese: 沃薩隨杜庫征戰加利德蘭，絕地幾乎全滅曼達洛人。

sentences.english: Van der Vart is also on World Cup duty with Holland.
sentences.chinese: 範特瓦特同樣在世界盃賽場上，他在荷蘭隊陣中征戰。

sentences.english: This season they made their worst start in 89 years of league football.
sentences.chinese: 本賽季龐貝的開局是球隊89年聯賽征戰史上最差的。

sentences.english: Patrick is the most popular driver in IndyCar.
sentences.chinese: 她目前是征戰印地系列賽賽車手中，人氣最旺的一個。

sentences.english: Gamorreans live in clans, and these clans are the basis for their wars.
sentences.chinese: 加莫人以氏族爲社會單位，相互征戰。

sentences.english: Jonathan Zebina and Mohamed Sissoko are both ruled of the running.
sentences.chinese: 澤比納和西索科被排除在此次客場征戰羅馬的名單中。

sentences.english: The characters in the two films swing their  swords for very different reasons.
sentences.chinese: 兩部影片中，木蘭們征戰沙場的原因各不相同。

sentences.english: There is a military character in Qin s culture which is born in multifarious wars.
sentences.chinese: 萌生於頻繁征戰的秦文化先天具有軍事性。

sentences.english: As a result of yesterday's battle on behalf of Spain to the Confederations Cup.
sentences.chinese: 由於要代表西班牙征戰聯合會杯的比賽的緣故。

sentences.english: David Trezeguet and Zlatan Ibrahimovic have been told they will be playing in Serie B next season.
sentences.chinese: 特雷澤蓋和伊布被通知他們下賽季隨隊征戰乙級。

sentences.english: Over time, Merduk and Innana began to hate one another and eventually warred upon one another.
sentences.chinese: 他們隨時間流逝開始彼此仇恨，並最終彼此征戰。

sentences.english: The Azulones will play Europa League football next term.
sentences.chinese: 赫塔菲將在下賽季征戰歐聯杯。

sentences.english: Now they find themselves playing in the Europa League instead next season.
sentences.chinese: 而現在，他們還是隻能在下賽季征戰歐聯杯。

sentences.english: And are Paro and Marchisio ready for the top flight?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，帕羅和馬爾奇西奧有實力在頂級聯賽中征戰嗎？

sentences.english: And we believe that a lot of spiritual warfares are happening because of CCCC.
sentences.chinese: 如同前面我們說過，這是一場屬靈征戰。

definition: an expedition, esp. military/march to remote regions
lit. to proclaim oneself hegemon/to take a leading role/to build a personal fiefdom
to glare like a tiger watching his prey (idiom)/to eye covetously
to fight in one place after another
to leave one's native place, esp. against one's will (idiom)
to enlist/to serve in the army
to reveal outstanding talent (idiom); to stand out as conspicuously brilliant
can be counted on one's fingers (idiom)/very few
